definition[0]: a quality in the way someone speaks, produced when the air used to speak passes through their nose as well as their mouth
example[1]: Her voice had a slight Australian twang.
definition[1]: a quick ringing sound like the one made by pulling a very tight wire and then suddenly letting it go
definition[2]: if you twang something or if it twangs, it makes a quick ringing sound by being pulled and then suddenly let go
